<doc> Password -- Password encryption

== Description ==

PASSWORD encrypts password as required by the Hop authentication mechanism.

== Services ==

PASSWORD defines two services:

  - ++[[password]]++: This is the main entry point of the 
 PASSWORD. It presents the user with a form for typing in passwords.
  - ++password/encrypt++: This service encrypts a PASSWORD. It takes two
 arguments: 
   * ++user++, the user name
   * ++password++, his unencrypted password.

</doc>
